bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with ru shi fa 乳石發 , outbreak of stalactite mineral [poisoning]. Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 Substance Entry lü dou 綠豆：主丹毒 , 煩熱 , 風疹 , 藥石發動 , 熱氣奔豚 , 生研絞汁 服 , “To master cinnabar poisoning with vexing heat, wind papules, outbreak of [stalactite] mineral drug [poisoning] , heat qi with running piglets, grind fresh [ lü dou ], wring to obtain the juice, and ingest”.
